jobDescription: We are looking for a Senior Full Stack Developer with 5+ years of experience in React, Node.js, and AWS. Must have experience with microservices, Docker, and CI/CD pipelines. Strong problem-solving skills and ability to work in agile environments required.
resumeText: Experienced Full Stack Developer with 6 years in web development. Proficient in React, Node.js, Express, and MongoDB. Built scalable applications using Docker and deployed on AWS EC2. Experience with Git, Agile methodologies, and team collaboration. Strong background in JavaScript, HTML, CSS, and REST APIs.
